name: Fake Call Santa
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Santa Call.
False Call Santa - this is a game application where you can joke to call Santa Claus or Santa as a joke!
Raffle loved ones, let people think that Santa is calling you on a holiday!
Frightened friends and other relative, turn fake call Santa and show a friend or someone you know, they will be surprised!
Pretend there is a Santa! Raffle them they will be surprised! In the game you can choose different ringing Santa Claus! A real blast and a voice straight out of the tube! Listen to the voice of joyful Santa!
Feel the atmosphere of Christmas and New Year!
ATTENTION! This is not a real but only an imitation of the call! The app does not bear any harm and is only for entertainment and jokes!
Thank you for playing with us! Leave us your feedback and we will try to make our apps even better!
